subject: CBSNews.com News Alert! Suspected Gunman Arrested In Virginia Tech Shooting Spree
body:
Officials have told The AP that a gunman suspected in one killing and seven 
to eight additional casualties at Virginia Tech has been arrested.



Log on now to www.cbsnews.com, or wap.cbsnews.com for wireless users, for details. 

Wireless photo and video alerts from CBSNews.com, direct to your phone. Subscribe now at http://www.cbsnews.com/htdocs/wireless/index.php.
